MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: vodovod, pipe, mania, dream, music, ooze, water, flow, puzzle, action, arcade, game, free, download, classic
English.Char_Desc_45: Free pipe connecting game like Pipe Mania
English.Char_Desc_80: A free pipe connecting game similar to Pipe Mania or Pipe Dream
English.Char_Desc_250: A single-player action puzzle game. You get a limited number of pipes on each level, and need to combine them to lead the water from house at the top of the screen to the storage tank at bottom. It is similar to the games Pipe Mania and Pipe Dream.
English.Char_Desc_450: Vodovod is a single-player action puzzle game. You get a limited number of pipes on each level, and need to combine them to lead the water from the house at the top of the screen to the storage tank at the bottom. It is similar to the Windows games Pipe Mania and Pipe Dream.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Vodovod is a single-player action puzzle game. You get a limited number of pipes on each level, and need to combine them to lead the water from the house at the top of the screen to the storage tank at the bottom. It is similar to the Windows games Pipe Mania and Pipe Dream.
